offline.title: You are offline
offline.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

support.title: Support
support.description: Short videos that explain the basic features.
support.makeResDescription: Use the + button and the calendar to create a new reservation.
support.editResDescription: When you click on a reservation, the + button will change to an edit button. Clicking it will allow you to modify the reservation.
support.inBetweenResDescription: When you select a reservation that intersects other reservation, the time picker will reflect the avaiable check-in and check-out times.
support.shareResDescription: Tap the share button in on a reservation to share it with anyone.
support.crossMonthResDescription: Select the first or the last day of a month and swipe to the next or previos month to create reservations that extend months.

layout.addToHomeScreenDescription: This application is optimized for mobile devices. To add it to your home screen, follow these two easy steps:
layout.shareButton: In your browser, tap the share button.
layout.checkConnection: Please check your internet connection and try again.

reservation.name: Name
reservation.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the reservation.

userManagement.loginDescription: You can only login if your employee has registered you.

protectedRoute.unauthorized: You are not authorized to view this page.

share.title: Share this reservation
share.linkCopiedDescription: The reservation link has been copied to your clipboard.
share.copyFailedDescription: Unable to copy the link. Please try again.
